DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the lens and lens case microbial colonization associated with marketed care solutions used by experienced soft lens wearers.
DOC.brief_title: Compliance and Contamination in Soft Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to assess the lens and lens case microbial colonization associated marketed care solutions used by experienced soft lens wearers.
DOC.criteria: Successful contact lens wear on a daily wear basis Normal Eyes Topical ocular medication use No active ocular issues
